speaker: Donald Trump
sentence: The most popular person in the history of the Republican Party is Trump.
politifact_statement: They just came out with a poll, did you hear? The most popular person in the history of the Republican party is Trump! ... So I said, does that include Honest Abe Lincoln?
verified_claim: Wow, highest Poll Numbers in the history of the Republican Party. That includes Honest Abe Lincoln and Ronald Reagan.
verified_claim_article_title: No, Donald Trump's poll numbers do not beat Lincoln, all other GOP presidents

speaker: Donald Trump
sentence: In some states, Democrats are even trying to give illegal immigrants the right to vote.

speaker: Donald Trump
sentence: We've taken the toughest-ever actions in response to China's abusive trade practices.

speaker: Donald Trump

speaker: Donald Trump
